title: Worktrees
description: Manage isolated workspaces for your Auto Claude tasks
selectProject: Select a project to view worktrees
noWorktreesDescription: Worktrees are created automatically when Auto Claude builds features.
noWorktreesHint: You can also create terminal worktrees from the Agent Terminals tab.
mergeWorktreeDescription: Merge changes from this worktree into the base branch.
deleteWorktreeDescription: This will permanently delete the worktree and all uncommitted changes.
deleteTerminalWorktreeDescription: This will permanently delete the worktree and its branch. Any uncommitted changes will be lost.
agentTerminalsDescription: Spawn multiple terminals to run Claude agents in parallel.
newTerminalHint: Use <kbd>...</kbd> to create a new terminal.
mergeDialogDescription: Merge changes from this worktree into the base branch.

error.taskNotFound: Task not found for this worktree
